articles.title: Ed Sheeran pulls pints and sings with locals at a pub in Birmingham - Daily Mail
articles.description: Ed, who is said to have a net worth of £153 million, treated himself to drinks at the in The Roost Pub in Small Heath, where you can get four pints for £8 or six shots of sambuca for £10.
articles.content:
Ed Sheeran shocked pubgoers in Birmingham on Sunday as he danced around singing with them before hopping behind the bar to pull pints.
